Title: Caught on Tape
Plot: The team takes on a case of a dead Marine who recorded his death while falling off a cliff. The prime suspects are his wife and his best friend with whom he had a picnic in the camp. Gibbs finds out they had an affair behind the dead man's back and he tries to persuade each of them to blame each other. Meanwhile, Abby reconstructs the case using her computer skills to handler the Marine's camera...
Writer: Christopher Crowe, John C. Kelley, Gil Grant
GuestStars: Tim De Zarn, Marieh Delfino, David Lipper, Kevin Sizemore, Brian Dietzen, John Lacy
